laboratory_examinations.findings: White blood cell count: 4920 cells/mL, Hemoglobin level: 11.5 g/dL, Platelet count: 129,000 cells/mL.
Total bilirubin: 17.8 mg/dL, Direct bilirubin: 11.2 mg/dL, Alanine aminotransferase (ALT): 363 mg/dL, Aspartate aminotransferase (AST): 359 mg/dL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial ALT: 363 mg/dL, later increased to 5727 mg/dL; Initial AST: 359 mg/dL, later increased to 25,615 mg/dL.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Elevated creatine kinase level: 579 U/L (reference range: 38–160 U/L).
Fibrinogen level: 322.3 mg/dL (reference range: 163.5–362.7 mg/dL), D-dimer level: 2.4 mg/mL (reference level: <2.09 mg/mL).
Two sets of blood cultures yielded S. sonnei growth.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood cultures were taken on the day after the patient’s death.
